translations: 蒙古症；[医] 先天愚型（一种先天性畸形病症，表现为扁平额、斜眼、小指头短等）

sentences.sentence: Late maternal age has certainly been implicated in mongolism .
sentences.translation: 先天愚型就与高龄生产有关。
